#summary GUI Texture functions
<BR>
<BR>
=== CreateGUITexture(string filename) ===
----
Creates a GUI texture using the given image filename.
====Parameters====
   * _filename_ - The image filename.
<BR>
<BR>
=== DestroyGUITexture(real gui_texture_id) ===
----
Destroys a GUI texture.
====Parameters====
   * _gui_texture_id_ - The ID of the GUI texture.
<BR>
<BR>
=== GetGUITextureWidth(real gui_texture_id) ===
----
Returns the width of a GUI texture.
====Parameters====
   * _gui_texture_id_ - The ID of the GUI texture.
<BR>
<BR>
=== GetGUITextureHeight(real gui_texture_id) ===
----
Returns the height of a GUI texture.
====Parameters====
   * _gui_texture_id_ - The ID of the GUI texture.
<BR>
<BR>
